item.title: Tabletop role-playing game
item.description: Curated resources Character management Pathbuilder – for Pathfinder 2e 5th Edition Spellbook – spell management for Dungeons & Dragons 5e Virtual TableTop Foundry VTT Maps, assets, tokens, audio DungeonDraft – map maker 2-minute Tabletop – maps, assets & tokens Tabletop audio – ambient sounds database Databases (rules, items, monsters, lore, …) pf2etools.
